ibis.ipl.server
Interface RegistryServiceInterface

public interface RegistryServiceInterface

Interface to the registry. Mostly for getting information on the members of each pool from the registry.

WARNING: This is an Experimental feature of the IPL. It may not function correctly, future releases of the IPL may have a revised API for this feature, or it may be removed completely.

Method Summary
 String[] getLocations(String poolName)
          Obtains a list of locations of members of a specified pool.
 IbisIdentifier[] getMembers(String poolName)
          Obtains the current members of a specified pool.
 String[] getPools()
          Obtains a list of pools from this registry service.
 Map<String,Integer> getPoolSizes()
          Obtains a map mapping pool names to pool sizes from this registry service.
 

Method Detail

                  throws IOException
Obtains a list of pools from this registry service.

Throws:
